quests.desc: Welcome to TextWorld! Here is how to play! First of all, go east. And then, try to venture south. After that, travel west. After that, attempt to go south. With that done, travel south. And then, make an effort to travel east. And then, move south. Then, open the portal in the cellar. Then, move east. And then, retrieve the sponge from the counter. Alright, thanks!

infos.name: sauna
infos.desc:
You arrive in a sauna. A normal one.

 You make out a counter. The counter is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_0] On the counter you can see [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] The counter appears to be empty.[end if]

 There is [if d_5 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading west. There is an unblocked exit to the north.

infos.name: cellar
infos.desc:
You've walked into a typical room. Your mind races to think of what kind of room would be typical. And then it hits you. Of course. You're in the cellar. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.

 You make out a safe.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The safe is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

 There is [if d_5 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: canteen
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a canteen.



 There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: playroom
infos.desc:
You arrive in a normal kind of place. That is to say, you're in a playroom.

 You see a couch. The couch is standard.[if there is something on the s_1] On the couch you can make out [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] However, the couch, like an empty couch, has nothing on it. You make a mental note to not get your hopes up the next time you see a couch in a room.[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an unguarded exit to the south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
Wow! You're in a bedroom.



There is an unguarded exit to the north. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: scullery
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a scullery. An ordinary one. The room is well lit.



There is an unblocked exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: recreation zone
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a recreation zone.

 You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal a bed stand. The bed stand is normal.[if there is something on the s_2] On the bed stand you can make out [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] However, the bed stand, like an empty bed stand, has nothing on it. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the bed stand.[end if] You see a mantle. [if there is something on the s_3]You see [a list of things on the s_3] on the mantle. Classic TextWorld.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3]But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading east. There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading west.

infos.name: cookhouse
infos.desc:
You are in a cookhouse. A normal kind of place.

 You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal a chair. Why don't you take a picture of it, it'll last longer! [if there is something on the s_4]You see [a list of things on the s_4] on the chair.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4]But the thing is empty, unfortunately. This always happens, here in TextWorld![end if] Oh wow! Is that what I think it is? It is! It's a platter. The platter is usual.[if there is something on the s_5] On the platter you can see [a list of things on the s_5].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5] But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading south. There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading west.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
I am pleased to announce that you are now in the studio.

 You see a suitcase.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The suitcase contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The suitcase is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: dish-pit
infos.desc:
You've entered a dish-pit.



You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: lounge
infos.desc:
You are in a lounge.

 You make out a bed. [if there is something on the s_6]On the bed you see [a list of things on the s_6].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6]The bed appears to be empty.[end if] You see a bar. [if there is something on the s_7]You see [a list of things on the s_7] on the bar. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this![end if][if there is nothing on the s_7]However, the bar, like an empty bar, has nothing on it.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: kitchenette
infos.desc:
If you're wondering why everything seems so standard all of a sudden, it's because you've just walked into the kitchenette.

 You see [if c_2 is locked]a locked[else if c_2 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] refrigerator.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The refrigerator contains [a list of things in the c_2]. Wow, isn't TextWorld just the best?[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The refrigerator is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: cookery
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a cookery.

 You can make out a chest.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] What a letdown! The chest is empty![end if] You see a fridge.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The fridge contains [a list of things in the c_4]. Now that's what I call TextWorld![end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] What a letdown! The fridge is empty![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: kitchen
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a kitchen.

 You make out a plate. The plate is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_8] On the plate you can see [a list of things on the s_8].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_8] But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: launderette
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a launderette.



You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
Guess what, you are in a place we're calling a vault.

 Hey, want to see a soap scented safe? Look over there, a soap scented safe.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The soap scented safe contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] The soap scented safe is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading north. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading south.

infos.name: sweaty dish-pit
infos.desc:
You are in a dish-pit. A sweaty one. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.

 You can make out a board. [if there is something on the s_9]On the board you can see [a list of things on the s_9]. Hmmm... what else, what else?[end if][if there is nothing on the s_9]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of garbage. This always happens![end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading south. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading north.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in the shower. You can barely contain your excitement.



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading north. There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: bathroom
infos.desc:
Ah, the bathroom. This is some kind of bathroom, really great usual vibes in this place, a wonderful usual atmosphere. And now, well, you're in it.



You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: closet
infos.desc:
You arrive in a closet. A typical one.

 You see a rack. [if there is something on the s_10]On the rack you see [a list of things on the s_10].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_10]Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. You think about smashing the rack to bits, throwing the bits into a pit, etc, until you get bored.[end if]

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: portal
infos.desc: The portal looks hefty. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: door
infos.desc: The door looks sturdy. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: gate
infos.desc: it is what it is, a gate [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.desc: it is what it is, a gateway [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.desc: The passageway looks towering. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.desc: The hatch looks grand. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.desc: The safe looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.desc: The suitcase looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.desc: The refrigerator looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.desc: The chest looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.desc: The fridge looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.desc: The soap scented safe looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

objective: Who's got a virtual machine and is about to play through an exciting round of TextWorld? You do! Here is your task for today. First step, head east. With that accomplished, venture south. With that accomplished, try to take a trip west. And then, venture south. Then, head south. With that accomplished, try to move east. After that, head south. Then, open the portal inside the cellar. Having pulled open the portal, try to go to the east. Following that, pick up the sponge from the counter inside the sauna. And once you've done that, you win!
